      Methods in lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator that throw SimulationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DeliveryChuteSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Permits the delivery chute to be loaded with items without causing events to be announced.
      void CoinReceptacleSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Loads the indicated coins into the receptacle without causing events to be announced.
      void CoinRackSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(Coin... coins)
      Allows a set of coins to be loaded into the rack without events being announced.
      void PopCanRackSimulator.loadWithoutEvents(PopCan... pops)
      Allows pop cans to be loaded into the pop can rack without causing events to occur on its listeners.

      Permits the delivery chute to be loaded with items without causing events to be announced.
